title: Trio of Sweet Root Vegetable Purée

ingredients.content: 180 g carrots, cut in pieces (3 cm)
180 g parsnips, cut in pieces (3 cm)
180 g sweet potatoes, cut in pieces (3 cm)

preparations.content: Place carrots, parsnips and sweet potatoes in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add water and milk then cook <b>15 min/100°C/speed 2<b>. Purée <b>1 min/speed 10<b>.
Allow to cool slightly then serve or freeze in portions.
